name: Basic Oracle Spellcasting
summary: You gain the basic spellcasting benefits.
description:
You gain the basic spellcasting benefits. When you gain a spell slot of a new level from the oracle archetype, add a common divine spell or another divine spell you have learned or discovered to your repertoire, of that spell level.Basic Oracle Spellcasting Leads To...
